io.github.rowak

Class Aurora.Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.Aurora.Position
      • io.github.rowak.Aurora.Panel
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.Panel
extends Aurora.Position
    Represents a single Aurora light panel. Used to store JSON-parsed data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Panel(int id, int x, int y, int orientation)
      Creates a new instance of a Panel.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Panel

        public Panel(int id,
             int x,
             int y,
             int orientation)
        Creates a new instance of a Panel.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the panel
        x - the x-value of the panel location
        y - the y-value of the panel location
        orientation - the panel's orientation on the Aurora grid
